pinyin: Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2

definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The Straits of Gibraltar are the strategic passage between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 直布羅陀海峽是地中海通向大西洋的咽喉。

sentences.english: A handful eventually reached the Mediterranean by swimming eastwards through the Straits of Gibraltar.
sentences.chinese: 少數大白鯊經直布羅陀海峽，最終向東游到了地中海。

sentences.english: These pillars were known as the Straits of Gibraltar in bygone times.
sentences.chinese: 這些石柱在過去被稱爲是直布羅陀海峽。

sentences.english: The ship was found floating in the middle of the Strait of Gibraltar.
sentences.chinese: 這艘船被發現時正漂浮在直布羅陀海峽的中央。

sentences.english: Gibraltar is the key to the Mediterranean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 直布羅陀海峽是地中海的咽喉要道。
